title: Secure Azure Deployment Patterns
abstract:
Microsoft has provided an almost unlimited number of ways for you to securely deploy Azure resources; but people continue to make simple mistakes. In 2017 many organisations had breaches due to poor cloud deployment practices.

In this session, youâ€™ll learn how to use Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates to deploy resources in a secure manner. This session will look at Azure Storage, App Services, SQL, Virtual Machines and Virtual Networks. I'll discuss the costs, benefits and trade-offs of different design patterns and how you can secure your deployment pipelines.
